features: ✅[55.3" Long Handle Broom and Dustpan Set] Made of high-quality stainless steel poles with excellent performance in rust resistant, solid and light weight, which is easy to clean. Different people’s cleaning needs will be satisfied with the five extension poles which can be installed in different length. For example the children, adult and old man, especially for backache people, help you finish the sweeping jobs without bending.

✅[Excellent Features] Large dustpan space, with heighten baffles on both sides, is designed for hold more rubbish, avoiding the rubbish falling out; Thoughtful broom teeth help you clean the hair of women or pet more quickly and conveniently, and does not get on your hands; Upgraded four layers bristles are made of PET material, more durable and stiff to clean heavier garbage

✅[Easy Assembly] You just need screw the extension poles into the hole and quickly complete the installation. And the dustpan can be stored upright and easily put into a narrow space to make the room tidier and save space, if you want to hang it for storage, this broom can also meet your requirements. Our broom dustpan set is to bring great convenience to your life.

✅[Wide Application] Ideal for home and office cleaning work, suitable for paper, dust, dirt, hair and pet hair sweeping. We also included a set of mini broom and dustpan set to help you clean the desktop rubbish, the cute dustpan is a great choice for children to clean up their DIY garage, it can be hung storage as well.

✅[After-sale Service & Package]: Applied to environmentally friendly packaging, the box contains a broom and dustpan, a extra set of mini broom dustpan set. If you have any questions about our products and services, please feel free to contact us. We would be glad to help you solve any problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The broom is amazing. It was easy to attach everything as per the instructions and also it came with a mini broom and dustpan which I find to be cute. And our family dog. He sheds a lot of hair so it gets all over the place and our last broom just had hair stick to it but this broom says it has this comb attached to the dustpan. It works wonders and no hair has been attached to it since and plus it stands up by itself in the corner without it falling attached to dust pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This broom and pan surprised me. As I was putting it together I thought it was too many parts and going to be to weak. The bristles felt too soft or something. SHOCKED! Nothing like I thought. The bristles are sturdy but still flexible to go under things like the stove or toe kick. The handles in many pieces actually are sturdy. It took me just a few minutes to get it all tightened up. Once I started using it I had to retighten a couple of times but then it stayed tight. I am very pleased with this broom and pan. It actually sweeps up the smallest things with these bristles like sugar. I had no idea the little bit of sugar had leaked but this broom swept it up. The bristles do not get stuff stuck to them (not so far) like fuzzy stuff, it sweeps into a pile and stays in the pile not on the broom. So shocked, from disappointed to totally pleased. HIGHLY recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quick sweep and dump
reviews.reviewText: Kinda of flimsy. Color is nice. Not heavy duty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars not sure what i was expecting…
reviews.reviewText: it is smaller than i expected. the dust pan handle goes directly to my hand which is nice. the broom feels cheaply made aswell as having to manually change the dustpan from sitting down to up so you can put the broom inside a seen in the picture. It did come with a complementary mini broom and dustpan, so I appreciated that. Overall, it’s a cute set but not very nicely made but you got what you pay for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a real broom with working dustpan for a toddler, and this is perfect. You can leave out some of the extension poles, and in the shortest configuration, this set is similar sized to the shortest configuration of the green Swiffer mop - a great pairing for Montessori practical life skills or just teaching little one about cleaning up! Metal poles and plastic parts are lightweight, and the bristles can be rinsed if needed. Love the dustpan; the comb part helps get everything off the broom. The dustbin can twist to be stored upright (convenient if hung on the wall) or it can sit on the floor and stay up without support. Toddlers may not be able to click the broom into the holder slot on the dustpan for storage, but I love this feature. I look forward to reclaiming this set and adding the extenders back in to make it adult height again once the kid grows out of it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the way this broom sweeps its able to fit in all the corners and tight spaces. Well designed and easy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small broom size
reviews.reviewText: Overall, I thought the item was a good quality. Light weight & sturdy, I did like the fact that it had extensions so you could make the room longer or shorter as you needed. However, the broom brush itself was smaller than I had anticipated so for big jobs you would probably not use this broom. But for small light housekeeping, it is ideal for small spaces. I also liked the clean out comb to rid the broom bristles of pet hair or other dirt & fibers. It has a handy clip on the side of the dust handle to attach the broom handle for convenient storage. Suprise It came with a small personal dust broom and tray for those pesky cookie crumbs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Don’t buy this! Total crap, flimsy, doesn’t hold its position keeps folding, it sucks. Get the oxo one instead that one is great
